channel.title: CVE Feed for Pimax -- Pimax Play
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pimax -- Pimax Play

item.title: CVE-2024-41889|2024-08-07T18:43:04.676Z -- pimax -- pimax%20play
item.description: Multiple Pimax products accept WebSocket connections from unintended endpoints. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary code may be executed by a remote unauthenticated attacker.
